job_description:
Savvas Learning Company is a global education company that produces award-winning learning solutions that empower educators and engage students with the highest quality content.

Recognized as an industry leader, we serve millions of K-12 learners with innovative, student-centered educational programs that turn today’s classrooms into active learning environments. By embracing technology, personalized learning, and immersive experiences delivered across multiple platforms, we design our learning solutions to be more accessible and relevant to each student.

Our comprehensive solutions for core curriculum, and supplemental and intervention programs - supported by an array of professional development services - allow teachers to use data to inform classroom practices and tailor instructions to an individual’s abilities and learning styles.

Senior Software Engineer UI, Software Development

We are currently looking for innovative hands-on Full UI Stack Senior Software Engineer to architect, design, develop, test, and advance sophisticated next generation applications

What You’ll Do

You’ll work closely with the Product Management team to ensure we're building the best products.
You’ll function as a senior developer on a small team (globally distributed) of 4-6 individuals and help drive sound engineering design, process and quality practices, and perform acceptance engineering
You’ll synthesize business requirements and be able to map them to functional and technical requirements.
You’ll write code that is modular, and utilize automation wherever possible in your development processes to assure code quality, consistency, and reusability.
You’ll research, analyze, design, implement, and provide effective solutions for short term and long term needs.
You’ll migrate existing systems from AngularJS to a modern Angular12+ framework with Micro Front Ends using Module Federation.
You’ll mentor other UI developers, work in a team environment with both onsite and offshore teams, share knowledge, and evaluate new technologies and software products to determine feasibility and desirability of incorporating their capabilities into the platform.
You’ll use your communication skills to share information with others who have varying degrees of technical knowledge.
You’ll work with the Architecture team to assure smooth integration of the Micro Front Ends you develop.

Qualifications

Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, with strong fundamentals and problem solving skills.
5+ years experience in web software development roles
2+ years minimum experience working in an agile environment is required
Expert knowledge and capabilities in Angular, React.js, Vue or equivalent Javascript Framework with web services/APIs
Expert knowledge of core UI stack (HTML5, Javascript, CSS, SCSS)
Experience with Software Design, Implementation (i.e. coding), and Testing
Working knowledge of Node.js
Experience with configuration management systems and concepts, specifically GitHub
Experience with Accessibility and WCAG 2.1 a strong plus
Experience with SQL, relational databases, JSON objects, or other formatted data a plus
Experience with UI tools such as Stencil and Storybook a plus

Savvas Learning Company provides access to a benefits experience created to offer our employees choice, flexibility, and the opportunity to save money for the future. Benefits include medical, dental, vision, tax-advantaged accounts, pharmacy, life insurance, disability insurance, matching 401(k), and paid time off. Our benefits are part of a total package that is carefully designed to support the total well-being of our employees.

Savvas Learning Company is an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employer and a member of E-Verify. All qualified applicants, including minorities, women, protected veterans, and individuals with disabilities are encouraged to apply.
